name: Planet Breaker - Mobile multiplayer
description:
Planet Breaker is an online multiplayer game with up to 9 players. Destroy enemy planets with your friends and unlock new powerful weapon upgrades to rule your universe.

Current state: Open alpha

Since I am the only developer and this is my first game, there are still some bugs. These will be fixed up to the final version.
Some features are not yet available, but will be added soon:

  • Weapon upgrade system
  • Settings menu
  • Different game modes
